_comment: Medium configuration with arithmetic crossover and adaptive mutation
_comment_profile: Balanced execution with sophisticated exploration - arithmetic crossover explores intermediate solutions while adaptive mutation self-regulates based on feature selection ratio

_comment_crossover_descriptions.arithmetic: Arithmetic crossover - arithmetic combination using alpha parameter

_comment_mutation_descriptions.adaptive: Mutation rate adapts based on current feature selection ratio

_comment_parameters.uniform_swap_prob: Used with uniform crossover - probability of swapping each gene
_comment_parameters.arithmetic_alpha: Used with arithmetic crossover - weight factor (0 < alpha < 1) - set to 0.6 for medium exploration
_comment_parameters.block_size: Used with block mutation - size of contiguous block to mutate
_comment_parameters.adaptive_min_prob: Used with adaptive mutation - minimum mutation probability (reduced for medium pace)
_comment_parameters.adaptive_max_prob: Used with adaptive mutation - maximum mutation probability (balanced for medium exploration)

_comment_performance_notes.population_size: Medium population for balanced exploration vs computation time
_comment_performance_notes.generations: Moderate generations allowing thorough search without excessive runtime
_comment_performance_notes.crossover_prob: Higher crossover probability to leverage arithmetic blending
_comment_performance_notes.mutation_prob: Conservative base mutation rate, adaptive mechanism will adjust as needed
